sarah Gibes Chimes SciTech editor is a junior from Gurnee Illinois PERIOD She is majoring in biochemistry and writing and aspires to be a primary care physician in the distant future PERIOD Outside of Chimes and her homework she enjoys working as a teaching assistant for the biology department playing bassoon with her wind trio reading books in German and exploring the outdoors PERIOD
